description.value:
When extended and activated gives Flyer (12) Trait. Requires Pilot (Personal) Skill to use and wearer must launcher from an elevated position of at least 15 metres. Best Craftsmanship gives +10 to Skill Tests to use.

Requirements

Half a Metre thick and bulky when folded as a backpack, quite wide when extended, may not fit in tight spaces.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
